oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: |han=kass'o (Klein Jantje) (VIII)
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: An account of how ||kabbo's tobacco pouch was stolen by a dog ('Blom') while he slept at night, and of the subsequent search for it. 1) p.6137v: see ||kabbo's song on the loss of his tobacco pouch; see The names of |kaggen's wife, son and daughter, 2) This story is found in Book VIII-1.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Lucy Lloyd |xam notebooks
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: The loss of ||kabbo's tobacco bag, which was stolen by a hungry dog, belonging to !gou !nui, named 'Blom'
